title: "Lighter In Tone But Not in Skin Tone"
itunes:title: "Lighter In Tone But Not in Skin Tone"
description:
A real fun one this week as we talk all things Dungeon Mastering (or Game Mastering). We get maniacal with monsters and modules and investigate our inspirations. So if you are a DM looking for some new tricks, interested in DMing for the first time or just a player wanted a peek behind the screen what are you waiting for... the play button is right there! Plus stick around as we introduce a fun new section...


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
